description: This template deploys a multi-vm base environment on corpnet with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain.
summary: Deploys 2 or more VMs: Server 2012 R2 or 2016 AD DC, Server 2012 R2 or 2016 app server(s) and optional Windows 10 client(s). Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs.
